TopicTitle: Some Things For When Multiplier Comes Out

Articles.Content:
According To The Wiki Kerbal Space Program ( A.K.A. The Best Game Ever ) Has A Plan To Add Multiplier, A Few Things That I Think Would Improve The Game For When Multiplier Is Released, Is A Mod Api That Allows You To Download Mods In The Game, And Installs Them Automatically When You Connect To A Server With Said Mods. Multiple Space Centers, I Mean Your Not Going To Have NASA, The Soviet Union, Space X, And Virgin Galactic All Using One Space Center, Being Able To Chose An Available Space Center When You Join. Customize-able Space Suits, Not In A Large Scale Just The Two Basic Colors To Tell Whose Kerbals Are Whose, Example The Default Colors Are red And White. Being Able To Lock Ships, So Only You And People Who You Allow Will Be-able To Assess Your Ships. Being Able To Have Multiple Logos, Example Being Able To Have The NASA Logo On One Pod And The Kerbal Space Program Flag On Another Pod On The Same Ship.

Cheers

~ John To The Brogan

Two things:

A- A typo on Multiplayer. I was confused for a moment there when you were talking about this stuff for a "multiplier".

B- That is really hard to read with a capital letter beginning every word.

Other than that, those are good ideas. Some of them are currently in use in different mods (RSS with different launch sites (I think it's RSS), Kerbal MultiPlayer with ship-locking)

But as of yet, Multiplayer is not a real demand of the Community as a whole. It would be nice, I'll admit, but there are other things that a lot of people would like to have first, i.e. better aerodynamics.
